The city for the order or location for the stop.

restriction.name: Oneway
restriction.description: One way road enforcement, leave on!

restriction.name: Driving an Automobile
restriction.description: Check on and set to Prohibited to avoid roads prohibited for automobiles.

restriction.name: Driving a Bus
restriction.description: Avoid roads prohibited to busses

restriction.name: Driving a Taxi
restriction.description: Avoid roads prohibited to taxis

restriction.name: Walking
restriction.description: Avoid roads prohibited to pedestrians

restriction.name: Riding a Motorcycle
restriction.description: Avoid roads prohibited to motorcycles

restriction.name: Driving a Truck
restriction.description: Check on and set to Prohibited to avoid roads prohibited for trucks.

restriction.name: Driving a Delivery Vehicle
restriction.description: Check on and set to Prohibited to avoid roads prohibited for delivery vehicles.

restriction.name: Driving an Emergency Vehicle
restriction.description: Check on and set to Prohibited to avoid roads prohibited for emergency vehicles.

restriction.name: Through Traffic Prohibited
restriction.description: Soft Restriction: Choose Avoid (Low, Medium, or High) for how strongly you wish to avoid roads which prohibit through traffic.

restriction.name: Avoid Unpaved Roads
restriction.description: Avoid unpaved roads.

restriction.name: Avoid Toll Roads
restriction.description: Soft Restriction: Choose Avoid (Low, Medium, or High) for how strongly you wish to avoid toll roads.

restriction.name: Avoid Limited Access Roads
restriction.description: Soft Restriction: Choose either Prefer or Avoid (Low, Medium, High) for how strongly you wish to prefer or avoid Interstate highways.

restriction.name: Avoid Ferries
restriction.description: Soft Restriction: Choose Avoid (Low, Medium, or High) for how strongly you wish to avoid ferries.

restriction.name: Avoid Private Roads
restriction.description: Avoid private roads.

restriction.name: Avoid Gates
restriction.description: Avoid gated communities.

restriction.name: National STAA Preferred Route
restriction.description: Prefer STAA routes.

restriction.name: National STAA and State Truck Designated Preferred Routes
restriction.description: Prefer STAA and state truck routes.

restriction.name: National STAA and State Truck Designated and Locally Preferred Routes
restriction.description: Soft Restriction: Choose Prefer (Low, Medium, or High) for how strongly you wish to prefer STAA, state, and local truck routes.

restriction.name: Use Preferred Truck Routes
restriction.description: Prefer designated truck routes.

restriction.name: Use Preferred Hazmat Routes
restriction.description: Prefer designated HazMat routes.

restriction.name: Avoid Express Lanes
restriction.description: Avoid express lanes.

restriction.name: Avoid Carpool Roads
restriction.description: Avoid carpool roads.

restriction.name: HazMat: NRHM Preferred Route
restriction.description: Prefer NHRM routes.

restriction.name: HazMat: Explosives Preferred Route
restriction.description: Check on to prefer routes for transporting explosives

restriction.name: HazMat: Poisonous Inhalation Hazard Preferred Route
restriction.description: Check on to prefer roads for poisonous materials.

restriction.name: HazMat: Medical Waste Materials Preferred Route
restriction.description: Check on to prefer roads for medical waste.

restriction.name: HazMat: Radioactive Materials Preferred Route
restriction.description: Check on to prefer roads for radioactive material transport

restriction.name: HazMat: General Hazardous Materials Preferred Route
restriction.description: Check on to prefer roads for HazMat transport.

restriction.name: Tall Vehicles Preferred Route
restriction.description: Check on to prefer routes for tall vehicles.

restriction.name: HazMat: Explosives Restricted
restriction.description: Check on to avoid routes where explosives are restricted

restriction.name: HazMat: Gas Restricted
restriction.description: Check on to avoid roads where transporting gas is restricted.

restriction.name: HazMat: Flammable Goods Restricted
restriction.description: Check on to avoid roads where transporting flammable materials is prohibited.

restriction.name: HazMat: Flammable solid/Combustible Restricted
restriction.description: Check on to avoid roads where transporting solid/combustible flammables is prohibited.

restriction.name: HazMat: Organic Goods Restricted
restriction.description: Check on to avoid roads where transporting hazard organic materials is prohibited.

restriction.name: HazMat: Poison Goods Restricted
restriction.description: Check on to avoid roads for poisonous materials.

restriction.name: HazMat: Radioactive Goods Restricted
restriction.description: Check on to avoid routes where radioactive materials are restricted.

restriction.name: HazMat: Corrosive Goods Restricted
restriction.description: Check on to avoid roads where transporting corrosive materials is prohibited.

restriction.name: HazMat: Other Hazardous Materials Restricted
restriction.description: Check on to avoid routes where other hazardous goods are restricted.

restriction.name: HazMat: Any Hazardous Materials Restricted
restriction.description: Check on to avoid routes where any hazardous goods are restricted.

restriction.name: HazMat: Poisonous Inhalation Hazard Restricted
restriction.description: Check on to avoid roads where poisonous materials are prohibited.

restriction.name: HazMat: Goods Harmful to Water Restricted
restriction.description: Check on to avoid roads where goods harmful to water are restricted.

restriction.name: HazMat: Explosive and Flammable Restricted
restriction.description: Check on to avoid roads where explosive and flammable materials are restricted.

restriction.name: Height Restriction
restriction.description: Check on, set to Prohibited, and enter the height of your vehicle(s). Specify in feet.

restriction.name: Weight Restriction
restriction.description: Check on, set to Prohibited, and enter the weight of your vehicle(s). Specify in tons.

restriction.name: Weight per Axle Restriction
restriction.description: Avoid roads where the vehicle weight per axle exceeds the parameter specified in feet.

restriction.name: Length Restriction
restriction.description: Check on, set to Prohibited, and enter the length of your vehicle(s). Specify in feet.

restriction.name: Width Restriction
restriction.description: Check on, set to Prohibited, and enter the width of your vehicle(s). Specify in feet.

restriction.name: Semi or Tractor with One or More Trailers Prohibited
restriction.description: Check on to avoid roads where semi or tractors with trailers are prohibited.

restriction.name: Truck with Trailers Restriction
restriction.description: Check on to avoid roads where trucks with trailers are prohibited.

restriction.name: Axle Count Restriction
restriction.description: Check on, set to Prohibited, and enter the number of axles.

restriction.name: Any Hazmat Prohibited
restriction.description: Check on to avoid roads where Hazmat transport is prohibited.

restriction.name: Trailers: Truck with One or More Trailers Restricted
restriction.description: Avoid routes where specified number of trailers is restricted.

restriction.name: Trailers: Truck with Two or More Trailers Restricted
restriction.description: Avoid routes where specified number of trailers is restricted.

restriction.name: Trailers: Truck with Three or More Trailers Restricted
restriction.description: Avoid routes where specified number of trailers is restricted.

restriction.name: Trailers: Semi or Tractor with One or More Trailers Restricted
restriction.description: Avoid routes where specified number of trailers is restricted.

restriction.name: Axles: Two or More Axles Restricted
restriction.description: Avoid routes where specified number of axles is restricted.

restriction.name: Axles: Three or More Axles Restricted
restriction.description: Avoid routes where specified number of axles is restricted.

restriction.name: Axles: Four or More Axles Restricted
restriction.description: Avoid routes where specified number of axles is restricted.

restriction.name: Axles: Five or More Axles Restricted
restriction.description: Avoid routes where specified number of axles is restricted.

restriction.name: Axles: Six or More Axles Restricted
restriction.description: Avoid routes where specified number of axles is restricted.

restriction.name: Kingpin to Rear Axle Length Restriction
restriction.description: Avoid roads where the length exceeds the parameter specified in feet.

param.attrname: Kingpin to Rear Axle Length Restriction
param.paramname: Vehicle Kingpin to Rear Axle Length (feet)

server.description: The server is used for drawing map layers.

server.description: The server is used for routing operations.
